title: mamee_shares_last_banana_batch_to_dogs_farm_origin
summary: MaMee shares the last batch of farm-grown bananas with the dogs; consumption is from on-farm produce with no purchase required.
description: This record documents MaMee distributing the last batch of bananas grown on the farm to the dogs at 12:33 local time. The bananas are farm-origin produce and are consumed without external purchase. The event links to prior feeding and harvest-related records for continuity.

reference.note: Links to prior feeding record (Data Unit 00920) and banana harvest batch record (Data Unit 00414: 13 bunches, naturally ripened), and Proof 512 (2026-01-19).
